definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: You can reduce your output by avoiding aerosols and driving less, for starters.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過避用氣霧劑或少開車來減少起動機的排氣。

sentences.english: He had constipation for few days but still had flatus passage todays.
sentences.chinese: 他有少許日子是便祕的，但是今天仍然有排氣。

sentences.english: Keep foods away from ranges or refrigerator exhausts.
sentences.chinese: 保持食物遠離爐竈或冰箱的排氣管。

sentences.english: The feasibility of up-draft gasifier which exhausts in its middle in fixed beds is verified.
sentences.chinese: 證明上吸式中間排氣固定牀氣化爐的可行性。

sentences.english: When returning a cylinder to storage, the valve outlet seal must be installed leak-tight.
sentences.chinese: 當鋼瓶返回儲存時，必須安裝好閥門排氣口密封。

sentences.english: The catalytic converter on your exhaust system contains cerium and lanthanum.
sentences.chinese: 排氣系統上的接觸反應器含有鈰和鑭。

sentences.english: Please adjust the clearance of the exhausted valve.
In this paper atmospheric pollution created by agricultural diesel engines is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 着重討論了農用動力機的排氣對大氣的污染。

sentences.english: The tests must be done in the lab equipped with exhauster.
sentences.chinese: 測試必須在裝有排氣裝置的實驗室內進行。

sentences.english: Isolate all circuits by closing the zone valves and purge and balancing valves.
sentences.chinese: 通過關閉區域閥門和排氣平衡閥來隔離所有循環迴路。

sentences.english: The "Crows Nest" has screened venting to provide additional ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 在“烏鴉巢”的甄別，以提供額外的排氣通風。

sentences.english: Lock the exhaust valve inits open position .
sentences.chinese: 把排氣閥固定在它的開啓位置。

sentences.english: We have an extractor fan in the kitchen to get rid of the smell of cooking.
sentences.chinese: 我們的廚房裏有臺排氣扇，用來消除油煙。

sentences.english: The formulas for sound power of exhaust noise in frequency domains are given.
sentences.chinese: 在頻域上給出了排氣噪聲聲功率的公式。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
